body_html:
When I try to leave review comments on this, I get an error from github, start commit oid is not part of this pull request. :-/

I think this may be because you have a merge commit in this PR. Can you try rebasing that way?

Anyway here's my review comment, looks good other than that.

Please use style /*id=*/stream_executor::cuda::kPlatformId.

We have linters internally that recognize this style and will raise an error if the comment does not match the parameter name.

(The 0 /*default address space*/ comment is unfortunate but the correct way to do it, because the comment does not match the parameter name.)

We have linters internally that recognize this style and will raise an error if the comment does not match the parameter name.
(The 0 /*default address space*/ comment is unfortunate but the correct way to do it, because the comment does not match the parameter name.)
body:
When I try to leave review comments on this, I get an error from github, `start commit oid is not part of this pull request`.  :-/

I think this may be because you have a merge commit in this PR.  Can you try rebasing that way?

Anyway here's my review comment, looks good other than that.

Please use style `/*id=*/stream_executor::cuda::kPlatformId`.

We have linters internally that recognize this style and will raise an error if the comment does not match the parameter name.

(The `0 /*default address space*/` comment is unfortunate but the correct way to do it, because the comment does not match the parameter name.)
